alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 12:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm, with heavy rainfall, will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1208 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Durbin, or 8 miles east of Fruit Cove, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fruit Cove, Ponte Vedra Beach, World Golf Village, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Bayard, Durbin and Guana River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Visibility will be reduced to less than 1 mile. For boaters on or near the Intracoastal waterway, between South Jacksonville Beach and Saint Augustine, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
